text: The team that owns this said they were going to start work on the items we identified that needed to be fixed before launch this week. From where I’m sitting it doesn’t look like too much work so it should be pretty quick but We’ll announce it as soon as it’s ready

Anyone have any recommendations for how to send an email from a workflow action?
When we were planning our current project, the plan was to fire a webhook which would have just sent a transactional email via mailchimp. HubSpot has since moved this functionality into operations hub pro and our client is not prepared to spend an additional £600 a month just to be able to send email

If the email has to be sent through Mailchimp, then I would recommend creating a <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|custom workflow action> for the customer, which doesn’t require operations hub pro (they’re available to anyone with workflows access).

Alternatively, if the email could be sent with HubSpot, you could just use the email workflow action.

Is it possible to get engagements with images without auth? If I request recent engagements all urls to img urls have `signed-url-redirect`
You don't need to publicly list your app, you can authorize your app to just the portal you want using the oAuth flow.

unlikely, because the engagements always appear inside the portal, and would be confidential stuff that wouldn't be wide-open
but we need A LOT more detail on your request, and logs of the api calls themselves but with the API Key removed
more data, more data, more data
